instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Pro meados de 2012 820-3115-B Slow and accelerated fan
threads.message: Macbook lento com e sem carregador, cooler acelerado, fiz o teste ASD normal, sem danos líquidos, já verifiquei o trackpad liso, alguma dica obrigado.

threads.title: Macbook Pro meados de 2012 820-3115-B Slow and accelerated fan
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Did you try disconnecting webcam?

threads.title: Macbook Pro meados de 2012 820-3115-B Slow and accelerated fan
threads.message: Muito obrigado, sou grato por compartilhar experiências com todos. Eu não fiz isso, vou desconectar. depois publique o resultado.

threads.title: Macbook Pro meados de 2012 820-3115-B Slow and accelerated fan
threads.message: Realmente resolvido, agora tenho que remover o vidro para verificar se o problema é câmera ou cabo. obrigado.

threads.title: Macbook Pro meados de 2012 820-3115-B Slow and accelerated fan
threads.message: Just cut off ALS lines from pins 4 & 5 of J3502...
